
### jump-oriented programming  {.smaller}


* seems like <code>ret</code> is the problem? 

   * solve by protecting rets (e.g. hardware shadow stack)?

* problem: don't actually need <code>ret</code> 
<hr class="vspace" />
* just look for gadgets that end in <code>call</code> or <code>jmp</code>
* don't even need to set stack
* harder to find than <code>ret</code>-based gadgets 

   * but almost always as powerful as ret-based gadgets
